title: Reliance aims to make Jamnagar the energy capital of the world; unveils big plans for its new energy biz
description: Reliance Industries Limited's Chairman, Mukesh Ambani, has announced plans to make Jamnagar the world's energy capital, including solar photovoltaic module production by year-end. Ambani expects the new energy business to become profitable within 5-7 years.
